tool_description: Get Porn/Idol Gallery Images from on of the largest database
name: Bloom - Hina
title: Bloom - Hina

api_list.name: Pagination

optional_parameters.name: idol
optional_parameters.description: idol Filter,      use comma to use multiple idol as filter

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: Source filter,      use comma to use multiple source as filter

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description:
Gets Text query data from db

Strict Termed Searches are to be made with a double quote 
     eg: "Skinny"
Exclusion are to be made in this format after any prefilter
     eg: "thick" ~"skinny"

optional_parameters.name: idol
optional_parameters.description: idol Filter,      use comma to use multiple idol as filter

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: Source filter,      use comma to use multiple source as filter

api_list.name: Idols
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bloom-hina.p.rapidapi.com/hina/idols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bloom-hina.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bloom-hina.p.rapidapi.com/hina/{id}/thumb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bloom-hina.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
